about_the_game:
BUT WAIT, this time it's an actual game... You read that right. Earn rewards by clicking, and equip the drops to have real gameplay impact. We're taking this FAD and cranking it up to 11 - to be a real game genre! Raising the bar so games of this type have to actually be FUN!


Summoned by a Goddess to a fantastical world, you’re tasked with saving it from destruction. Gather equipment, recruit party members, and battle the endless hordes of the Demon Lord!


  • Steam Item Drops: They even stack for simplified management of your Steam Inventory
  • Tons of Guaranteed Loot: Regular drops every 3hrs, multi drops every 100 and 1000 kills, and many more!
  • Bonus Rewards: Earn bonus items every 100, and 1000 Enemies defeated
  • Player cards: Collect your friends and add them to your party!
  • Exciting Clicker Gameplay (obviously): Click your way to wealth and glory!
  • Refer a friend bonus drop!
  • No fruits or veggies! bleh!
  • Mindless NPC Slaughter
  • In-Game Crafting
  • Mouse & Keyboard Support
  • Gamepad Support
  • More than 20 lines of code!


  • Storyline updates as the global community progresses
  • Achievements galore (real ones!)
  • Global events where everyone can participate and earn event drops
  • Monthly releases for the first 3 months, then quarterly release/update cycle
  • Connectivity to future games titles that continue the story
  • Inter-game Item Usage: Our items are always valuable/useful across game titles

Dive into Demon Lord: Clicker and become the hero this world desperately needs. Ready, set, click!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A Steam-Drop Clicker with real game mechanics in a high fantasy setting. Click for drops, then choose to combine them for stronger/rarer variants, equip them for power! Amass wealth and glory! Be the hero, assault the Demon Lord! (No fruit is harmed during gameplay)
